movies.title: Grim Reaper
movies.plot: The stripper Rachel is hit by a cab but survives in the emergency room of a hospital. However, she sees Death chasing her, but she does not succeed in convincing the nurses. She is drugged and wakes up in St. Joseph, a mental hospital administrated by Dr. Brown. She finds five other inmates that had a near death experience and also claim that Death is coming for them, but Dr. Brown tells them that they are subject of a mass hypnosis experiment. Meanwhile, Rachel's boyfriend and student of medicine Liam seeks her nearby the night-club. While trying to escape from the facility, Rachel discloses the truth about Dr. Brown and St. Joseph.
movies.simplePlot: The stripper Rachel is hit by a cab but survives in the emergency room of a hospital. However, she sees Death chasing her, but she does not succeed in convincing the nurses. She is drugged ...

biography.bio: Cherish Lee is an actress, known for American History X (1998), Grim Reaper (2007) and Chicago Massacre: Richard Speck (2007). She has been married to Matt Dunn since October 22, 2014.
biography.name: Cherish Lee

biography.bio: J.D. Head is an actor, known for Grim Reaper (2007).
biography.name: J.D. Head

biography.bio: Benjamin Pitts is an actor, known for Grim Reaper (2007).
biography.name: Benjamin Pitts

biography.bio: James C. Burns was born on February 25, 1959 in Pittsfield, Massachusetts, USA. He is an actor and cinematographer, known for Call of Duty: Black Ops (2010), Call of Duty: Black Ops II (2012) and Coldwater (2013).
biography.name: James C. Burns

biography.bio: Adam Fortin was born on November 4, 1970 in Northridge, California, USA as Adam Aurele Fortin. He is an actor, known for Grim Reaper (2007).
biography.name: Adam Fortin

biography.bio: Jay Wilkins is an actor, known for Grim Reaper (2007), Ed Gein: The Butcher of Plainfield (2007) and A Dead Calling (2006).
biography.name: Jay Wilkins

biography.bio: Serdar Kalsin was born in 1974 in Istanbul, Turkey as Serdar Burhan Kalsin. He is known for his work on Iron Man 3 (2013), Be Cool (2005) and Uncharted 2: Among Thieves (2009).
biography.name: Serdar Kalsin

biography.bio: Born in Miami, Florida and raised in Queens, New York, Alice found her way to Southern California and has called it home for the past twenty-odd years. She also spent a couple of years in beautiful Flagstaff, Arizona while earning a Bachelor's Degree in Communication at Northern Arizona University. Alice is a founding member of The Theatre District Acting Company, and an active actor member of "Scriptwrights" Professional Screenplay Development Group. She is also the proud adoptive mom of an adorable Jack Russell Terrier, a terrific Tibetan Terrier, a tank full of funny and entertaining fish, and three Red-eared Slider Turtles. Yes - the animals rule the Kingdom!
biography.name: Alice Ensor

biography.bio: Brent Fidler was born to play characters that have a spiritual impact, his first stage role at age six being the bar owner that tossed Jesus out of the Inn and into the manger. Brent's theater and film company, Theater Crossing, has produced a wide variety of acclaimed productions in Canada and Los Angeles, that celebrate the subtle interaction between the physical and spiritual worlds. He has adapted his stage plays of Poe and Macbeth into screenplays, and has been optioned by accomplished Hollywood producer Doug Claybourne, of Poetry and Pictures, as well as Oceana Films and New Line Cinema. The American government granted him a green card as "an alien of extraordinary ability" and he concurs (at least about the alien part). Brent is the proud recipient of a Best Actor in a Dramatic Series LEO award for his chilling work in FF Coppola's series "First Wave". He produced, starred, in and directed his first feature film www.poelastdaysoftheraven.com which was nominated for a Best Director Gemini Award in 2010 and won Best feature Film at the Cinema City International Film Festival at Universal Studios in Los Angeles. Brent has just completed writing his first Bollywood screenplay in 2012.
biography.name: Brent Fidler

biography.bio: Nick Mathis was born on December 21, 1982 in Chicago, Illinois, USA. He is known for his work on Apocalypse, CA (2011), Grim Reaper (2007) and Chicxulub (2006).
biography.name: Nick Mathis

biography.bio: Peter Bisson was born on August 21, 1976 in Detroit, Michigan, USA as Peter Joseph Bisson. He is known for his work on Grim Reaper (2007), Dracula's Guest (2008) and Rolling (2013).
biography.name: Peter Bisson

biography.bio: Rebekah Brandes left her home in Baltimore, Maryland for Hollywood at 18 to attend the renowned American Academy of Dramatic Arts. After graduating she soon began appearing on TV shows such as NCIS, Criminal Minds, Greek and the The Forgotten, but it was the film world that really pulled her in. Rebekah gained attention for her breakout performance in the 2011 Sundance film festival premiere of "Bellflower", a film Rolling Stone called "a thing of toxic beauty". Her first lead role came three years earlier in the award-winning "Midnight Movie", gaining her a Best Actress nomination by the Chicago Horror Film Festival. Rebekah has three films yet to be released, the debut film by Slash of Guns N' Roses, "Nothing left to Fear", also starring Anne Heche and Ethan Peck, as well as 'April Apocalypse' with Reece Thompson, and "Fluidic", a sci-fi thriller. An avid animal rights activist, Rebekah has three dogs and runs a Los Angeles dog rescue called Ready Pet.
biography.name: Rebekah Brandes

biography.bio: Turiya Dawn is an actress, known for From a Lonely Bridge (2014), 11 Minutes Ago (2007) and Grim Reaper (2007).
biography.name: Turiya Dawn

biography.bio: Mike Korich was born on November 5, 1982 in Atlanta, Georgia, USA as Michael Johnson Korich. He is an actor and writer, known for Kingdom (2014), A Christmas Wedding Tail (2011) and Dear Me (2008).
biography.name: Mike Korich

biography.bio: Caia Coley was born on May 9, 1968 in Atlanta, Georgia, USA. She is an actress, known for 348 (1999), Choosing Matthias (2001) and Abandoned (2010). She has been married to Michael Feifer since April 14, 2001. They have one child.
biography.name: Caia Coley
